entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
